column1: Name / Purpose
[title_desc name="TFConfig" desc="Makes your life a little easier when setting up bindings for TFC." /]
[title_desc name="Portal 2 Map Launcher" desc="A simple but effective GUI for loading custom and stock portal 2 maps." /]
[title_desc name="Portal to Portal 2 Content Porter" desc="Greatly eases the process of porting content from Portal 1 to Portal 2." /]
[title_desc name="Barebones" desc="Barebones sets up the necessary files to create a basic mod ." /]
[title_desc name="D2 Modkit" desc="The Dota 2 Modkit provides tools to make your life easier when working with Dota 2 Files for modding." /]
[title_desc name="Dota API snippets for Sublime Text 2/3" desc="Adds Code snippets for the LUA api if you work with Sublime Text" /]
[title_desc name="Dota Custom Files Joiner" desc="Clever tool to help organize your custom file creation to avoid a mess." /]
[title_desc name="Dota2 Builder helper library" desc="A library to help make RTS-style and Tower Defense custom games in Dota 2" /]
[title_desc name="Emacs major mode for editing KeyValue files" desc="An Emacs major mode for editing files written in the KeyValues format that is used in Valve's Source engine. " /]
[title_desc name="KV Files Builder" desc="splitS the Dota 2 KV files into smaller files to make them easier to read / manage." /]
[title_desc name="KV Syntax highlighting and snippets for Sublime Text 2-3" desc="Valve's KV Syntax, Snippets, and plugins for Dota 2 Workshop's custom gamemode developers." /]
[title_desc name="KVLib A C# Key-Value parser and library" desc="Key Value Parsing library in C#" /]
[title_desc name="Lua API stub classes" desc="Publicly available snippets for Dota 2 Workshop Tools" /]
[title_desc name="Source 2 Resource Decompiler" desc="Decompiles the various _c formats into the content assets, can be used to decompile dota assets." /]
[title_desc name="Upgradeable Items KV Builder" desc="This script can be used to generate all the item levels and recipes for your items" /]
[title_desc name="Dota2 Sound Editor" desc="The Dota 2 Sound Editor allows you to modify sounds for items, voices, music and hero spells." /]
[title_desc name="KVUP" desc="Warcraft 3 -> Dota 2 KV Parser" /]
[title_desc name="ModDota Lib" desc="A Flash library for Dota 2 custom gamemodes" /]
[title_desc name="Player Say" desc="A scaleform UI file for latching and allowing Lua to work with player chat." /]
[title_desc name="VConsole 2 Lib" desc="A PoC library for working with the VConsole2 network protocol." /]
[title_desc name="WorldSmith" desc="Open source Dota 2 Mod Editor" /]
[title_desc name="Left 4 Dead 2 Map Generator" desc="Abandoned proof of concept algorithm for creating L4D2 maps from random tiles" /]
[title_desc name="SignMaker" desc="Easy to use tool for the creation of portal style signs for test chambers" /]
[title_desc name="TF2 Mod Installer" desc="Simple program used to install .vpk files into the TF2 custom content directory easily." /]
[title_desc name="Lyrics to CFG" desc="When you run the program it will take whatever is in the lyrics.txt and turn into a cfg you can run in game. " /]
[title_desc name="RCBOT FOR SVENCOOP 4.7" desc="This the RCBOTS need for play with the SA13 pack if you running the last version of SVENCOOP" /]
[title_desc name="ENABLE VIOLENCE CFG" desc="Enable Half Life 1 gore and blood, pretty much simple." /]
[title_desc name="Background Maker" desc="Put pic file in tool and make own background for TFC,HL,CS" /]
[title_desc name="FoxBot 7z for TFC" desc="FoxBot 7z for TFC" /]
[title_desc name="Deleted Scenes .fgd" desc="This is the file you will need to create maps for Condition Zero: Deleted Scenes. This tool was available at Urban Ruins But the site has shut down." /]

[title_desc name="cs:cz tweaker" desc="changes everything in your game including bot profiles of missions,bot profiles of multiplayer game,new mission packs , some things like grenades related challenges in original missions are removed." /]
[title_desc name="t missionpack v 3.0" desc="this is a mission pack for condition zero. to use xtract it to ur mission packs folder." /]
[title_desc name="Fgd for CS Condidtion Zero" desc="Fgd file for making maps for CS Condidtion Zero." /]

[title_desc name="CZ Bind Maker" desc="CZ Bind Maker is a custom buy script and configuration editor for Counter-Strike 1.6 and Condition Zero. It provides point and click, buy scripting and configuration editing capabilities" /]
[title_desc name="Fix Death Model Animation Tools" desc="Fix Death Model Animation Tools" /]

[title_desc name="Avis Bot Creator/Editor for Counter Strike CZ" desc="GUI Bot AI Editor!Allows you to create CS Bots (for 1.6-CZ) Easily with a GuI Interface..Also added more helpful tools to increase speed of Mission Pack Development. A Must-Have for every CS Player." /]

[title_desc name="Avis Bot Creator/Editor for Counter Strike" desc="GUI Bot AI Editor!Allows you to create CS Bots Easily with a Gui Interface..Also added more helpful tools to increase speed of Mission Pack Development. A Must-Have for every CS Player." /]
[title_desc name="UKTbinder7-2" desc="CS 1.6 key binder" /]
[title_desc name="CS_expert for hammer" desc="CS_expert  FGD for hammer" /]
[title_desc name="CsSv Map Loader" desc="This soft is useful for giving server admins o team members the opportunity to upload/download maps from your server without giving them FTP access." /]

[title_desc name="Commandmenu Editor" desc="Now you can make your custom in game menus, enjoy using your custom scripts with the comfort of a graphical menu. Now its easy, just add/remove/edit menus previewing result immediately!" /]
[title_desc name="CS 1.6 Plugin Installer" desc="Easy CS 1.6 Plugin Installer (amxx plugins only) by Galih Sitopan" /]
[title_desc name="Bot Editor 1.5.1" desc="This application create, edit, fixes, and save the database for your Counter-Strike 1.6 or any modification that base on 1.6 version." /]
[title_desc name="4hud" desc="A TF2 Hud editor for Windows" /]
